Title: Establishes the health care professionals heroes loan forgiveness program
Summary: Establishes the New York state health care professionals COVID-19 heroes loan forgiveness program of up to one hundred thousand dollars for persons who meet the eligibility requirements, including, physician or a professional or practical nurse, nurse practitioner, or clinical nurse specialist, physician assistant or specialist assistant; authorizes the commissioner of health to promulgate any necessary rules and regulations.
LawCode: Add ยง903-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the New York state health care professionals COVID-19 heroes loan forgiveness program
